info.title: Jiten API
info.description: OpenAPI documentation for Jiten. Use the Authorize button to provide a Bearer token.

get.summary: Returns the IDs of all parent media decks.
Returns the deck dto of all parent media decks.

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: 1 = Anime, 2 = Drama, 3 = Movie, 4 = Novel, 5 = NonFiction, 6 = VideoGame, 7 = VisualNovel, 8 = WebNovel, 9 = Manga

schema.description: 1 = Anime, 2 = Drama, 3 = Movie, 4 = Novel, 5 = NonFiction, 6 = VideoGame, 7 = VisualNovel, 8 = WebNovel, 9 = Manga

get.summary: Returns media decks with optional filtering, sorting and pagination.
get.description: Returns a paginated list of decks with optional filters, sorting and user coverage when authenticated.

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: Restrict to a specific media type.

parameters.name: wordId
parameters.description: If set, only decks containing this word are returned.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort field (title, difficulty, charCount, wordCount, sentenceLength, dialoguePercentage, uKanji, uWordCount, uKanjiOnce, filter, releaseDate, coverage, uCoverage, etc.).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status (none, fav, ignore, planning, ongoing, completed, dropped)

get.summary: Returns vocabulary entries for a given deck with sorting and pagination.

parameters.name: displayFilter
parameters.description: When authenticated: all | known | young | mature | mastered | blacklisted | unknown.

get.summary: Returns details for a media deck including parent and subdecks.

post.summary: Downloads a deck in the requested format and order. Supports filtering and excluding known words.
post.description: Generate a deck file (Anki, CSV, TXT, Yomitan) with optional filters and ordering.

post.summary: Parses a custom text into a temporary deck and returns the generated Anki package as base64.

get.summary: Returns the count of top-level decks per media type.
Returns the number of vocabulary items in a deck between global frequency ranks.
Gets decks from sliding 30-day windows based on offset for display in the update log

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Window offset: 0 = last 30 days, 1 = days 30-60 ago, 2 = days 60-90 ago, etc.

get.summary: Returns deck IDs that have a link of the specified type whose trailing URL segment matches the provided id.

schema.description: 1 = Web, 2 = Vndb, 3 = Tmdb, 4 = Anilist, 5 = Mal, 6 = GoogleBooks, 7 = Imdb, 8 = Igdb, 9 = Syosetsu

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Trailing identifier from the link URL.

get.summary: Returns all available tags for filtering (only tags with at least one associated media).

post.summary: Report an issue with a deck

get.summary: Get advanced stats for a deck such as coverage
get.description: Returns advanced deck statistics such as parametric coverage showing how many of the most frequent words are needed for various coverage percentages

get.summary: Get full coverage curve data for charting
get.description: Returns sampled coverage data points for interactive visualisation (~108 points)

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Number of data points (ignored if sampled data exists)

post.summary: Parses the provided text and returns a sequence of parsed and unparsed segments as deck words.
post.description: Parses the provided text and returns parsed words and any gaps as separate items, preserving order.
Returns the known state for each word/reading combination for the authenticated user.

post.summary: Rate (review) a word using the FSRS scheduler.
post.description: Rate (review) a word using the FSRS scheduler.

requestBody.description: A request containing the word to review and a rating

post.description: Set vocabulary state to neverForget or blacklist.

get.description:
Returns totals such as number of media per Jiten.Core.Data.MediaType, total mojis (characters), and total media.
The response is cached for 24 hours to reduce load.

429.description: Too many requests due to rate limiting.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Gets a word by its ID and reading index, including definitions, readings, frequency and user known state.
get.description: Returns a word with main and alternative readings, definitions, parts of speech, pitch accents, frequency and known state.

parameters.name: wordId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the word.

parameters.name: readingIndex
parameters.description: Index of the reading to treat as main (zero-based).

get.summary: Parses the provided text and returns a sequence of parsed and unparsed segments as deck words.
get.description: Parses the provided text and returns parsed words and any gaps as separate items, preserving order.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text to parse. Max length 500 characters.

get.summary: Gets IDs of words whose media frequency rank falls within the specified inclusive range.

post.summary: Returns up to three random example sentences for the given word and reading index, excluding already loaded ones.
post.description: Returns up to three random example sentences for the given word and reading index, excluding already loaded ones.

parameters.name: readingIndex
parameters.description: The reading index for the word.

requestBody.description: A list of deck IDs already loaded on the client to avoid duplicates.

CurveDatumDto.description: Single data point on the coverage curve

mediaType.description: 1 = Anime, 2 = Drama, 3 = Movie, 4 = Novel, 5 = NonFiction, 6 = VideoGame, 7 = VisualNovel, 8 = WebNovel, 9 = Manga

totalItems.description: The total number of items across all pages

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

totalItems.description: The total number of items across all pages

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

inverseRelationshipType.description: 1 = Sequel, 2 = Fandisc, 3 = Spinoff, 4 = SideStory, 5 = Adaptation, 6 = Alternative, 101 = Prequel, 102 = HasFandisc, 103 = HasSpinoff, 104 = HasSideStory, 105 = SourceMaterial

totalUniqueWords.description: Total unique words in the deck

milestones.description: Coverage milestones: percentage â†’ words needed

totalItems.description: The total number of items across all pages

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

items.description: 0 = Unknown, 1 = Noun, 2 = Verb, 3 = IAdjective, 4 = Adverb, 5 = Particle, 6 = Conjunction, 7 = Auxiliary, 8 = Adnominal, 9 = Interjection, 10 = Symbol, 11 = Prefix, 12 = Filler, 13 = Name, 14 = Pronoun, 15 = NaAdjective, 16 = Suffix, 17 = CommonNoun, 18 = SupplementarySymbol, 19 = BlankSpace, 20 = Expression, 21 = NominalAdjective, 22 = Numeral, 23 = PrenounAdjectival, 24 = Counter, 25 = AdverbTo, 26 = NounSuffix

linkType.description: 1 = Web, 2 = Vndb, 3 = Tmdb, 4 = Anilist, 5 = Mal, 6 = GoogleBooks, 7 = Imdb, 8 = Igdb, 9 = Syosetsu

items.description: 0 = New, 1 = Young, 2 = Mature, 3 = Blacklisted, 4 = Due, 5 = Mastered

Bearer.description: Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your JWT token.

ApiKey.description: API Key needed to access the endpoints. Use the 'X-Api-Key' header or 'Authorization: ApiKey <key>'.
ApiKey.name: X-Api-Key

tags.name: Stats
tags.description: Operations that provide global statistics for the Jiten dataset.

tags.name: MediaDeck
tags.description: Endpoints for browsing media decks, vocabulary, downloads and related statistics.

tags.name: Stats
tags.description: Provides endpoints that expose global statistics for the Jiten dataset.

tags.name: Vocabulary
tags.description: Endpoints for working with vocabulary: words, parsing text, and example sentences.
